strings.toolbar.dialog.clearAll.title: Clear everything?

strings.toolbox.draw.toast.error.rateLimited: You're making lines too fast. Please slow down.
strings.toolbox.erase.options.radius.label: Radius
strings.saveFiles.toast.legacyInfo: This save file was created with an older version of Free Draw. It can't be overwritten.
strings.saveFiles.details.clickPrompt: Click on a save file to reveal more options
strings.saveFiles.dialog.createSaveFile.title: Create save file
strings.saveFiles.dialog.createSaveFile.descript: What would you like to name this save file?
strings.saveFiles.toast.createSaveFile.error.rat: You're making save files too fast. Please slow down.
strings.saveFiles.toast.createSaveFile.error.int: Internal error occurred while trying to create save file. Please try again shortly.
strings.saveFiles.dialog.loadSaveFile.title: Load save file
strings.saveFiles.dialog.loadSaveFile.descriptio: Are you sure you want to load this save file? This will overwrite your current work.
strings.saveFiles.toast.loadSaveFile.error.drawB: You can't load this save file as you're banned from drawing.
strings.saveFiles.toast.loadSaveFile.error.overl: This save file overlaps with another player's claim. Move somewhere else and try again.
strings.saveFiles.toast.loadSaveFile.error.rateL: You're loading save files too fast. Please slow down.
strings.saveFiles.toast.loadSaveFile.error.inter: Internal error occurred while trying to load save file. Please try again shortly.
strings.saveFiles.dialog.overwriteSaveFile.title: Overwrite save file?
strings.saveFiles.dialog.overwriteSaveFile.descr: Are you sure you want to overwrite this save file? This can't be undone.
You're saving save files too fast. Please slow down.
Internal error occurred while trying to overwrite save file. Please try again shortly.
strings.saveFiles.dialog.renameSaveFile.title: Rename save file
strings.saveFiles.dialog.renameSaveFile.descript: What would you like to rename this save file to?
strings.saveFiles.dialog.deleteSaveFile.title: Delete save file
strings.saveFiles.dialog.deleteSaveFile.descript: Are you sure you want to delete this save file? This can't be undone.
strings.saveFiles.autosave.title: Autosave
strings.saveFiles.dialog.loadAutosave.title: Load auto-save
strings.saveFiles.dialog.loadAutosave.descriptio: Are you sure you want to load your auto-save? This will overwrite your current work.
strings.saveFiles.toast.loadAutosave.error.drawB: You can't load this auto-save as you're banned from drawing.
strings.saveFiles.toast.loadAutosave.error.overl: This auto-save overlaps with another player's claim. Move somewhere else and try again.
strings.saveFiles.toast.loadAutosave.error.rateL: You're loading save files too fast. Please slow down.
strings.saveFiles.toast.loadAutosave.error.inter: Internal error occurred while trying to load auto-save. Please try again shortly.
strings.versionHistory.title: Version History
strings.versionHistory.dialog.deleteSaveFileVers: Are you sure you want to delete this save file version? This can't be undone.
strings.versionHistory.toast.deleteSaveFileVersi: Failed to delete version from save file ${name}
strings.role.creator: Creator
strings.premium.title: Roblox Premium
strings.premium.rejoinNotice: You may need to rejoin for your purchase of Roblox Premium to take effect.
strings.votekick.kickMessage: You've been vote-kicked from this server. You'll be able to rejoin in ${minutes}m ${seconds}s.
strings.votekick.cooldownKickMessage: You were vote-kicked from this server recently. You'll be able to rejoin in ${minutes}m ${seconds}s.
strings.votekick.details.label: Vote to kick
strings.votekick.dialog.votekick.title: Votekick player
strings.votekick.dialog.votekick.description: Select the reason for voting to kick ${player}.
strings.moderation.dialog.latestAction.title: You're banned
strings.moderation.type.ban.permanent: You're permanently banned for ${reason}. Please file a ticket through our community server (social links) to appeal.
strings.moderation.type.ban.temporary: You're temporarily banned for ${reason} until ${expiry} UTC.
strings.moderation.type.drawBan.permanent: You're permanently banned from drawing for ${reason}.
strings.moderation.type.drawBan.temporary: You're temporarily banned from drawing for ${reason} until ${expiry} UTC.
strings.moderation.type.mute.temporary: You're temporarily muted for ${reason} until ${expiry} UTC.
strings.rules.title: Rules
strings.rules.description: Please read the rules before playing.
strings.rules.rule.contentSuitability: All content must be appropriate for Roblox. This includes but is not limited to hate speech, profanity, suggestive content, and controversial topics.
strings.rules.rule.griefing: No Griefing — Don't touch other people's art without their permission.
strings.rules.rule.scribbling: No Scribbling — Refrain from excessively scribbling over the canvas.
strings.claim.toast.error.overlapsClaim: The claim you're trying to create overlaps with another person's claim.
strings.claim.toast.error.overlapsDrawing: The claim you're trying to create overlaps with another person's drawing.
strings.claim.toast.error.overlapsSpawn: The claim you're trying to create is too close to the spawn point. Please move out a little further.
strings.claim.toast.error.tooSmall: The claim you're trying to create is too small.
strings.claim.toast.error.tooBig: The claim you're trying to create is too big.
strings.claim.toast.error.rateLimited: You're making claims too fast. Please slow down.
